# OnlineTranslation.ae - LLM Crawling Guidelines
# https://onlinetranslation.ae

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 5

# Block sensitive paths
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /api/private/

# Allow important content
Allow: /services/
Allow: /personal/
Allow: /legal/
Allow: /locations/
Allow: /resources/
Allow: /industries/
Allow: /specialized/

# Contact and Legal
Allow: /contact/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /privacy/
Allow: /terms/
